body:
Comment 3 by **maximilian.hasler**: 
Thanks -- yes, my fault, to some extend: On http://golang.org/doc/install.html I read

 "Choices for $GOARCH are amd64 (64-bit x86, the most mature port), 386 (32-bit 
x86)..."

and since I've got a 64-bit x86 box (Pentium D = dual-core 64-bit x86 processor), 
I blindly copy-pasted the three following lines...
